Nightstrike/Alpha:

Nightstrike cursed while he used his disk boomerang to cover himself 
as small shield, and for strange reason to cover Alpha... due he 
liked retain her in his power harmless or existed other reason??? 
Nightstrike wasn't unsure and he didn't like think about by now.

He trew his Disks boomerang (That he has in his right arm) against 
EPyon while we used Alphah to cover him for a possible attack from 
Siref and his friends
